mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date) VALUES(SEQ_TRANSACTION_TRAN_NO.NEXTVAL, #{purchaseProd.prodNo}, #{buyer.userId}, #{paymentOption}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{divyAddr}, #{divyRequest}, '1', SYSDATE, #{divyDate})
mapper.select: SELECT t.tran_no, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, TRIM(t.payment_option) payment_option, receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, TRIM(t.tran_status_code) tran_status_code, t.order_data, TO_CHAR(t.dlvy_date, 'YYYYMMDD') dlvy_date FROM transaction t WHERE tran_no = #{tranNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE transaction SET payment_option = #{paymentOption}, receiver_name = #{receiverName}, receiver_phone = #{receiverPhone}, demailaddr = #{divyAddr}, dlvy_request = #{divyRequest}, dlvy_date = #{divyDate} WHERE tran_no = #{tranNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM(SELECT t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, TRIM(t.payment_option) payment_option, u.user_name, u.cell_phone FROM transaction t, users u WHERE t.buyer_id = u.user_id AND t.buyer_id = #{userId} ) countTable
